name: Open Collective
description: Open Collective is an online funding platform for open and transparent communities. We provide the tools to raise and share your finances in full transparency. Money management made simple, plus great tools for community engagement, budget reporting, and fiscal sponsorship.

SDGs.evidenceText: Open Collective enables communities to be sustainable by unlocking access to funding and enabling communities to employ their members.
Open Collective enables communities to be sustainable by unlocking access to funding they otherwise wouldn't be able to access.
Open Collective enables communities to be sustainable by unlocking access to funding and enabling communities manage their own budget, making them sustainable in time.
